name: ZenSports
description: ZenSports is a peer-to-peer sports betting marketplace where anyone can create and accept sports bets with anyone else in the world, without the need for a centralized bookmaker. Deposit funds instantly using cryptocurrencies or fiat. No long wait times or deposit fees. Reduced betting fees compared to traditional bookmakers. Use our SPORTS utility token to get awesome discounts, cash back rewards, bonuses, and other perks.
